casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Hall, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Hall, 126 Ohio St.3d 55, 2010-Ohio-2696.]

*56(No. 2009-2149 — Submitted May 12, 2010 — Decided June 17, 2010.) Mathias H. Heck Jr., Montgomery County Prosecuting Attorney, and Johnna M. Shia, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. George A. Katchmer, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Massien, 125 Ohio St.3d 204, 2010-Ohio-1864, 926 N.E.2d 1282.

Brown, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
